value.title: The CLARIAH-AT Working Groups
value.summary: In accordance with the DHA Strategy 2021+, the CLARIAH-AT consortium has formed four working groups. Learn more about their activities.

value.title: About CLARIAH-AT
value.summary: CLARIAH-AT is the consortium of Austrian universities and research institutions that coordinates and drives Austrian activities in the European ESFRI research infrastructures CLARIN and DARIAH.
